changeSet.author: Aleksander.shukurov@gmail.com
changeSet.comment: fill in the table "companies" column "company_statuses_id" with test data
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO companies (company_status_id) SELECT FLOOR(RANDOM() * ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM companies) - 1) + 1) FROM (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000)) AS series ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
